column1: Uchi////- Uchi Salad - it amazes me how such a simple dish as this could be so refreshingly delicious and flavorful.  As the Japanese version of chips and dip
column2: the Uchi salad reinvents my perception of salads.  Hydroponic baby romaine lettuce leaves sprinkled with sea salt pairs so well with the lightly sweet edamame-jalapeno dip.  Each bite has you craving for more.
